name: Insight Mekong Delta By Cycling
description: Sustainability and ecotourism has become a trend for a lot of tourists in this century who have a common interest in protecting the green environment and preserving the cultural heritage of a destination. If you are looking for an eco-trip, the Insight Mekong Delta by Cycling is a right choice for you. 7km cycling ride will give you opportunities to experience the fullest of friendly and peaceful Mekong’s countryside where you can find unlimited green rice fields, fruit orchards and local cottage industries. A small sampan boat ride will add more fascination to your trip. Then, a home-hosted lunch of Mekong Delta specialties will be also enjoyable.
